column1: #text=I drove to the grocery store and got the list from my purse .
#text=I walked into the front door and was greeted by the cashiers .
#text=I went to the buggy area and got a large grocery cart .
#text=I proceeded down the produce aisle , making items off my list as I added them to my shopping cart .
#text=I then went to the meat department and asked the butcher to package some cuts of meat for me .
#text=After that I went to the dairy department and picked up some eggs , milk and butter .
#text=I proceeded to the check out area and waited in line .
#text=I placed my items on the conveyor belt as the cashier scanned them .
#text=After all my items were scanned , the cashier gave my my total .
#text=I gave her exact cash and proceeded to my car to place the groceries into my trunk .
